member.name: T:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions
member.summary: Provides a simple way to create and manage the options used by JSLint.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateBitwiseOperators
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether bitwise operators should be allowed.
member.value: true if bitwise operators should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeBrowser
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the standard browser globals should be predefined.
member.value: true if the standard browser globals should be predefined; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeCouchDB
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Couch DB globals should be predefined.
member.value: true if Couch DB globals should be predefined; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeInDevelopment
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether browser globals that are useful in development should be predefined, and if debugger statements and TODO comments should be allowed.
member.value: true if browser globals that are useful in development should be predefined, and if debugger statements and TODO comments should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeES6
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether using the good parts of ECMAScript Sixth Edition.
member.value: true if using the good parts of ECMAScript Sixth Edition; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateEval
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether eval should be allowed.
member.value: true if eval should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateForStatement
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the for statement should be allowed.
member.value: true if the for statement should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.MaximumErrors
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of warnings reported.
member.value: The maximum number of warnings reported.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.MaximumLineLength
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters in a line.
member.value: The maximum number of characters in a line.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateMultipleVariables
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a var, let, or const statement can declare two or more variables in a single statement.
member.value: true if a var, let, or const statement can declare two or more variables in a single statement; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.AssumeNode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Node.js globals should be predefined.
member.value: true if Node.js globals should be predefined; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateSingleQuoteStrings
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether single quote should be allowed to enclose string literals.
member.value: true if single quote should be allowed to enclose string literals; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateThis
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this should be allowed.
member.value: true if this should be allowed; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:JSLintNet.JSLintOptions.TolerateMessyWhitespace
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether strict whitespace rules should be ignored.
member.value: true if strict whitespace rules should be ignored; otherwise, false.
